ai-atk-s0402a57:2_0: used to be the first harem of the second absorption.
ai-atk-s0402a57:4_1: When the second, that is mentioned, and wrong view is described in the second enlightenment, etc., and right view.
ai-atk-s0402a57:6_3: Likewise in the case of the finest lady.
ai-atk-s0402a57:8_1: In the fourth tetrad there are four kinds of determination: the five storys of the aggregates and four noble expressions, sixth, seventy-four action, and the eighth noble expression.
ai-atk-s0402a57:8_2: Likewise associating with the eight encounters, that is to say, the collection of the Dhamma and the true teaching.
ai-atk-s0402a57:8_3: For the whole world, in the brightness of all worlds, the Uttarakuru,
ai-atk-s0402a57:8_4: And even in the nineteenth, stilling, he can get three paths, yet he may have the three paths of fruit.
ai-atk-s0402a57:9_0: The second group of people is finished.
